attributes.action: Save TNK Sheffield. Stop council brehs making dead flats and ruining culture!
attributes.background: The night kitchen popped off for bare time, loads of man enjoyed the vibes. Used to be called DLS back in the day, hol tite old school crew! But big issue here is all this gentrification and that, councils should respect party people and good music. safe.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
